content.title: Aneurysm Definition
content.definition: Focal dilation of artery to >50% of normal diameter. True aneurysm involves all three layers; false (pseudo) lacks adventitia.
content.statement: Aneurysm Definition is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Aneurysms that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Aneurysm Definition helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Aneurysm Definition include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Aneurysm Definition.
